Package main.inventory

Class Inventory

java.lang.Object
main.inventory.Inventory
public class Inventory extends Object
This class is used to create an inventory that the player could access.

    • addMonster

      public void addMonster(Monster monster, int cost)
      Adds monster to player's inventory. Subtracts cost of monster from player's gold.
      Parameters:
      monster - the monster to add to inventory
      cost - amount of gold the monster costs

    • addFood

      public void addFood(Food food, int cost)
      Adds food to player's inventory. Subtracts cost of food from player's gold.
      Parameters:
      food - the food to add to inventory
      cost - amount of gold the food item costs

    • addPotion

      public void addPotion(Potion potion, int cost)
      Adds potion to player's inventory. Subtracts cost of potion from player's gold.
      Parameters:
      potion - the potion to add to inventory
      cost - amount of gold the potion costs

    • removeMonster

      public void removeMonster(Monster monster, int income)
      Removes monster from player's inventory. Adds price of monster to player's gold.
      Parameters:
      monster - the monster to be removed from inventory
      income - amount of gold the player will earn from selling monster

    • removeFood

      public void removeFood(Food food, int income)
      Removes food from player's inventory. Adds price of food to player's gold.
      Parameters:
      food - the food to be removed from inventory
      income - amount of gold the player will earn from selling food

    • removePotion

      public void removePotion(Potion potion, int income)
      Removes potion from player's inventory. Adds price of potion to player's gold.
      Parameters:
      potion - the potion to be removed from inventory
      income - amount of gold the player will earn from selling potion
